A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The more I think back\, the more things I find that I don't like about this movie. But at the same time\, the more I realise these flaws ar just a small part of such a vast\, grand\, emotionally resonant movie. Some questionable narrative choices really annoy me\, but it's strong themes of learning from failure\, solid acting\, incredible action rousing score and breathtaking visuals make for a wildly entertaining time and a wonderful addition to the Star Wars universe.
